name: Battle Bingo: Win Real Money
description:
Million bingo lovers must not miss this Battle Bingo!You are here to compete against other players in fair, skill-based Bingo matches and win real cash! It's even more interesting with special competitive game modes and power-ups in this popular game.

MAIN FEATURES
• Asynchronous play, no waiting
• Each round only takes 2 minutes and can be played anytime, anywhere
• Use special power-ups to help get bingos. The faster you reach bingo, the higher the score
• Play fair and earn real cash rewards
• Good looking and fun gaming experience
• Reaching No.1 on the leaderboard will get large prize

INTERESTING POWER-UPS
• Free Dauber: Free daub on any open number.
• Magic Ball: Pick from 1 of 4 numbers, which hepls you get bingo.
• Triple Time: Score earned from daubing will be tripled in a period of time.
• Extra Time: Adds extra time to remaining.

FAIR GAME
Players in the same round will share the same cards, same balls, and same power-ups. Better skills and strategies help you get higher scores and then win the games.

Play Cash Mode to win crowns, then you can enter the leaderboard.The higher the ranking, the more prizes you get.Huge prize is for the 1st.

To know more about us, please refer to : http://www.kingsna.com/
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us: battlebingo777@gmail.com

Cash tournaments are not enabled in the following states: DE, LA, MD, MT, TN, AZ, AR, FL, NE, NM, and SC. If you don't live in a real prize-enabled region, you can still play for fun with our virtual currency.
